titles: Separation of churches from episcopal government, as practised by the present non-conformists, proved schismatical from such principles as are least controverted and do withal most popularly explain the sinfulness and mischief of schism ... by Henry Dodwell ...
author: Dodwell, Henry, 1641-1711.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Pages 322, 540 and 602 are stained; p. 582 has print faded; p. 609-610 are torn in filmed copy. Pages 576-615 photographed from Cambridge University Library copy and inserted at the end.
